Title: Shqipe

Actors: Arber Bamci, Ergys Bamci, Luis Bilali, Josefina Delia
Plot: Helena, a high school literature teacher, lives with her daughter Lola and her parents in Shkoder, Albania. But political upheaval in the early 90s forces her to take Lola and escape the ...
